title: MCP Configuration Complete Prevention Guide
description: COMPREHENSIVE MCP CONFIGURATION FOR CLAUDE CODE: 1) Configuration file: /root/agents/.mcp.json (NOT Claude Desktop config). 2) Environment variables: Use ${VARIABLE_NAME} references, never hardcode keys. 3) Master credentials: /etc/standup-sydney/credentials.env. 4) Sync command: /root/sync-all-credentials.sh. 5) Supabase: MUST use Personal Access Token (sbp_*), NOT Service Key. 6) 16 MCP servers configured: Supabase, GitHub, Notion, Slack, Metricool, Xero, N8N, Linear, Brave Search, Canva, Context7, Filesystem, Magic UI, Apify, Task Master, Puppeteer. 7) Environment files: /root/agents/.env receives synced values. 8) CRITICAL PREVENTION: Never confuse Claude Code (droplet) with Claude Desktop (local app).

solution.description: Created comprehensive MCP documentation in CLAUDE.md with critical configuration section, updated existing MCP section with all 16 servers, documented environment sync workflow, added troubleshooting steps, and provided fatal error prevention guidelines. Documentation now clearly distinguishes Claude Code from Claude Desktop and provides exact configuration locations and procedures.
